ygData.subject: Re: Brewing
ygData.msgSnippet: Try crag spiders in Eastern Karana.  They flourish on the Hill Giant mountain.  You can set up camp near the sign to High Hold (where the Paladin stops) and
ygData.messageBody:
Try crag spiders in Eastern Karana. They flourish on the Hill Giant
mountain. You can set up camp near the sign to High Hold (where the Paladin
stops) and lure to there. Not great loot, but great experience. Crag's are
about level 18 - 20, so bring a friend or 2. : )

Broon also spawns very close there, so be careful.... Or.... when you're a
little higher level (he's 23) with a little higher group, bring justice to
his ugly homer simpson looking skull. :) Seems we were the first on Xegony
to have this idea (yesterday) and I expect it to be sorely camped in the
near future... : /
(again horrible loot tho, so maybe not). We did it with a Level 23
Magician, a Level 21 Magician, and a Level 20 Bard (me :)

Darkfox Reven'tsol - Xegony


>4. Did 19 prove to be a difficult level for you that made it passed? I seem
>to be wallowing in low 19.
>
>Thanks
>Cleaver, Fennin Ro
